starwars

Class SWForceActor

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.monash.fit2099.simulator.matter.Entity
      • edu.monash.fit2099.simulator.matter.Actor<SWActionInterface>
        • starwars.SWActor
          • starwars.SWForceActor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EntityInterface, SWEntityInterface, SWForceEntityInterface
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Player, SWLegend

    public abstract class SWForceActor
extends SWActor
implements SWForceEntityInterface
    This class represents "FORCE ACTORS" whom are people posessing the power of the force These people are able to perform the obey command on weak minded people (non force posessors) You start with a force power of 5 and are able to train that up as you progress to unlock certain traits like being able to pweform MindControl and wielding a lightsabre
    Author:
    Michael Carter

      • setForce

        protected void setForce(Force force)
        Sets the Force of the SWActor.

        Useful when the SWActor's team needs to change dynamically during the simulation. For example, a bite from an evil actor makes a good actor bad.

        Parameters:
        force - the force of this SWActor
        See Also:
        force
